page.title: 03THE PARISH CHURCH
page.content:
St.Peters Church
The original church was burnt down in the year 1001 and soon another was built in its place. The first rector was in the year 1086,the year of the{Domesday Survey by William the Conqueror. The massive oak door at the entrance to the church has the date 1613 carved on it. The bell tower was built during the reign of{Queen Elizabeth I}but it collapsed on 31st of December 1582. It was rebuilt in 1584 and it was finished in 1589. The church provides about Â£100 for the{Sick & Needy.}The weekly donations to the church by the congregation will be used for this or for other people in need (e.g. Christian Aid).
